name: GetAutomationSummary
description:
Retrieve details of a specific classic automation workflow.

This tool fetches a summary of an individual classic automation workflow's settings and content, including trigger settings for the first email.

parameters.name: workflow_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the automation workflow to retrieve its summary.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the Automation workflow.

parameters.name: include_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Use dot notation for sub-object parameters.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: fields_to_exclude
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude from the automation workflow details. Use dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.
